frontmatter.title: Changelogs
frontmatter.meta_title: ReactXS - UIKit for Material Design 2.0 by React Native
frontmatter.meta_description: React Native currently creates vibrant wave in mobile application development. “Write once, Run anywhere”, then you can effectively produce mobile app across all platforms including iOS & Android by one language with “Native effect”.

markdownRemark.html:
Version 1.3.0 (15/01/2019)

1. New - Add more double value with extra BuzzApp template - https://shrtm.nu/robJ
2. New - Add more tuning homepage template with the trending homepage (Tab View) - https://shrtm.nu/NM1f
3. New - Flipboard effect
4. New - Headlines by RSS feed with Google news style - https://shrtm.nu/vIts
5. New - Youtube Channel screen - https://shrtm.nu/QiTR 
6. New - Instagram screen - https://shrtm.nu/hl7c
7. New - category slider at the homepage - https://shrtm.nu/PBpY
8. Update - we change the app branding from "CeNews" to "BuzzApp" as would like to use this as the default app demo.
9. Update - the document and config to switch between CeNews and BuzzApp
10. Update - latest library and upgrade performance

Version 1.2.0 (25/12/2018)

1. NEW - Integrate with CeBuilder for supporting OneClick installing & easier to customize the homepage
2. FIXED - login issue 
3. UPDATE - latest Expo and libraries
4. Wishing you have a very Merry Christmast !!!

Version 1.0.1 (09/11/2018)

1. UPDATE - fixed Login by Google is crashing
2. UPDATE - fixed post details get error undefined post.content despite post is not empty
3. UPDATE - fixed RTL design is incorrect
4. UPDATE - Update to latest Expo 31
5. IMPORTANT: update latest Expo 31 which could cause VERY SLOW at development mode (as you will get the "require cycle: " warning, please remove the IF block from node_modules/metro/src/lib/polyfills/require.js (https://gyazo.com/df9e8c80e88d51fed30807b0a369e7e1) - Or, select the build with PRODUCTION MODE to resolve the issues)

Version 1.0.0 (16/10/2018)

1. Release first version
